description: Shows details for one ore more spring boot applications

panels.description: This panel displays the used memory
panels.title: Used Memory

panels.description: Displays all instances which are running
panels.title: Application Instances

panels.description: This table displays the availability of an application at a given time
panels.title: Availability

panels.description: Displays the log events which occured
panels.title: Log Events

panels.description: This panel displays the avg response time
panels.title: Avg Response Time

panels.description: This panel displays the received and sent bytes
panels.title: Traffic

title: Spring Boot - Detail
